Bash(git merge refactor/phase1-domain-layer --no-ff -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge Phase 1: Domain Layer Migration to Clean Architecture

Successfully merged the complete domain layer refactoring from flat
package structure to organized subdomains following DDD principles.

Key Changes:
- Organized 47 domain entities into 7 subdomains
- Created domain.order with 5 new models for future broker abstraction
- Updated 201+ import statements across entire codebase
- Removed old domain.model and domain.enums packages
- Cleaned up 276MB of old database backups
- All 17 tests passing with zero failures

âœ“ domain.broker: Broker, UserBroker, UserBrokerSession, OAuth, enums
âœ“ domain.data: Tick, Candle, Instrument, Watchlist entities
âœ“ domain.signal: Signal, ExitSignal, MTF configs, enums
âœ“ domain.trade: Trade, TradeIntent, ExitIntent, TradeEvent, enums
âœ“ domain.order: OrderRequest, OrderResponse, OrderStatus, OrderType
âœ“ domain.common: ValidationResult, EventType, EventScope

This sets the foundation for Phase 2 \(Infrastructure layer refactoring\).
